# Toolkit Management

Tools for managing the toolkit itself.

## Tools

### [toolkit](toolkit.md)

Create and manage tools within the toolkit.

**Quick start:**
```bash
# Create new tool
toolkit create mytool --category document

# Edit the generated file
nano tools/document/mytool.py

# Install and use
make install
mytool --help
```

See [toolkit.md](toolkit.md) for full documentation.
